docs.snippet: The Indianapolis Colts quarterback’s abundant facial growth has taken on a starring role in television ads....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts quarterback’s abundant facial growth has taken on a starring role in television ads.
docs.abstract: Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck's unruly beard has kept him in the spotlight; Luck has starred in two television commercials and his beard has inspired countless comic Internet memes.

headline.main: For Andrew Luck, an Unruly Beard Is a Commercial Asset
headline.print_headline: His Road to Success  Is Covered With Whiskers

headline.main: Books on New York City Celebrate Its Sports and Its Jewish Delis

docs.snippet: Quarterback Josh Freeman has been trying to work his way back to the N.F.L. since 2013. His latest team is the Brooklyn Bolts of the fledgling Fall Experimental Football League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Quarterback Josh Freeman has been trying to work his way back to the N.F.L. since 2013. His latest team is the Brooklyn Bolts of the fledgling Fall Experimental Football League.
docs.abstract: Former NFL first-round quarterback Josh Freeman makes his debut with Brooklyn Bolts of Fall Experimental Football League, three-franchise operation in New York; completes 9 of 16 passes for 32 yards and fumbles five times in team's 29-6 loss.

headline.main: Humble Outpost for a Former First-Round Pick
headline.print_headline: Humble Outpost for a Former First-Round Pick

headline.main: Pirates Clinch Home Field in Wild-Card Game With Win

docs.snippet: Older adults are retiring to New York. For some, the original impetus is an urgent request to help raise a grandchild, but the pull of city life keeps them here....
docs.lead_paragraph: Older adults are retiring to New York. For some, the original impetus is an urgent request to help raise a grandchild, but the pull of city life keeps them here.
docs.abstract: Grandparents are moving to New York City from suburbs around the country, often at their children's bidding, to help with childcare; move often involves difficult transition from roomy suburban homes to expensive, tight quarters but most say challenge is satisfying.

docs.snippet: The game has the general feel of having been invented by someone who changed the rules on the fly to avoid losing....

docs.abstract: David Shaftel travel article on trip to Surrey England, for stay at Hampton Court Palace; recounts professional real tennis lessons on Royal Tennis Court, originally built in 1529; highlights websites and locations in Britain and US where some of  best real tennis facilities and instructors can be found.

headline.main: ‘Real Tennis’ May Be Obscure, but It Has Fans in Britain
headline.print_headline: Stepping Onto the Court and Back in Time
